Back to Sergei Rachmaninoff

Sergei Rachmaninoff

The Star-Spangled Banner (John Stafford Smith)

1918 · Threlfall and Norris III/11

[Wikipedia page 1] · [Wikipedia page 2] · [IMSLP]

This is an arrangement of The Anacreontic Song by John Stafford Smith, which was later used as the national anthem of the United States under the title The Star-Spangled Banner.

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 2
